channel.title: Cool way to drink a can
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]Disclamer: i cannot be held responable for anything you do with this information[/glow]
step 1: get an ordiary can like so [IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g199/jcs_double/Image017.jpg[/img]
step 2 pirce the top if the can with somthing with a sharpish end a pen will do [IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g199/jcs_double/Image018.jpg[/img]
now you should have somthing that looks like this with the hole in the middleof the thing the hold the thing to open the can normally [IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g199/jcs_double/Image019.jpg[/img]
step 3: shake and spray into your mouth [IMG]http://i56.photobucket.com/albums/g199/jcs_double/Image020.jpg[/img]
Warning:creates lots of froth good for burps

item.title: Cool way to drink a can
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

no, no, no, no, no. you shake the shit out of it and you drink dr. pepper and you pearce it where the “tab” is connected theres a little cercle. just poke it with a fork. you can spray the can almost empty and its a consetrated beam.

Read full topic
item.source: Cool way to drink a can

item.title: Cool way to drink a can
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

No, no, no, no, no! You SHAKE IT then open it, and quickly direct it to your mouth.

Read full topic

item.title: Cool way to drink a can
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

ha ha ha or you could go shot gun… take a can opener, cut a hole in the middle of the can length wise, put your thumb over it, open, tip, start drinking, let thumb go, drink up =p

Read full topic

step 1: get an ordiary can like so

step 2 pirce the top if the can with somthing with a sharpish end a pen will do

now you should have somthing that looks like this with the hole in the middleof the thing the hold the thing to open the can normally

step 3: shake and spray into your mouth
